page.title: 09Contact with the army-Lydden
page.content: The Ministry of Defence owns much land in the area.It is used for both night time and daytime exercises.Some local children enjoy their contact with the army.This account is by one of the local boys. My spare time is mainly spent on outdoor activities.I enjoy camping and going on hikes.I love the army,in fact,I am infatuated with the army.The army train in Lydden so I go looking for discarded military equipment.I go with the army when they dig trenches, make their camps and go on hikes.I get dressed up in my army gear and play war.My friend and I imitate what the army does.We make camps in bushes and I sometimes go to the army bunkers on Lydden hill.My friends and I go camping with the army equipment we own.I love going camping because the area is so beautiful.
